data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bustamante, Abel A., Ruiz, Gustavo R. S. (2017): Systematics of Thiodinini (Araneae: Salticidae: Salticinae), with description of a new genus and twelve new species. Zootaxa 4362 (3): 301-347, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4362.3.1|34 occurrences
